description: Visited the ubc location as we had our furry daughter with us She was allowed to dine in with us on the patio Here is what we ordered It wasnt as bad as I thought I tried everything the majority of the people on yelp recommended and it wasnt to shabby I was definitely full as heck and the kambucha was delicious down to the dessert It is self serve type of feel where you get your own water and cutlery and bring your own dishes back Fav was the mushroom pizza and the Thai ice cream This was a feast for two and it was more than enough as we had to get food to go Our furry daughter even had a little sample of the vegan Mac by accident ‍ its a nice near spot This is a good place to try
name: Virtuous Pie

author: Brent L.
description: Was visiting here during one of the recent heat waves but boy was it stinking hot in here Their A/C was out at the time and the roaring fire from their oven definitely did not help lol The first pizza I tried was their Ultraviolet 11.00 The crust was thin and crispy with baked kale tangy tomato crunchy pine nuts and yummy salty cheese I also managed to try their Super Funghi 11.00 Out of the two this one definitely stood out more There was a crazy amount of bitter arugula salty mushrooms and some of this interesting salty ricotta with each bite Given the heat I also ordered their Matcha Coconut ice cream 5.00 as all of their other varieties were sold out It was super creamy buttery and had a nice coconut aftertaste Tasty pizza and ice cream albeit expensive Would come back to try their other pies as long as their A/C is in working order lol
name: Virtuous Pie

author: Suzan L.
description: Anyone who says they dont love this place is lying And people still say vegan food is boring Have you TRIED Virtuous Pie Best pizza is Stranger Wings and the Pesto cbt Be warned though once you go there youll never be satisfied with Panago or Dominos ever again
name: Virtuous Pie

author: Donah O.
description: I absolutely loved this place The pizza was soo good Everything here is vegan and vegetarian Cashew cheese whoa Soo fantastic Well flavored They also have vegan ice cream and kombucha in tap Totally worth it The staff are also fantastic Very kind and helpful
name: Virtuous Pie

author: Ally S.
description: Second visit Between the 4 of us we shared the street corn Mac n cheese sausage and the margarita We also shared garlic knots Mac n cheese 11 and the side Brussels sprout salad 5 My fav pizza was the street corn I also liked the SA sausage more than I thought It had a good spice to it I also liked the other 2 but the street corn is for sure my fav First visit We got in just before happy hour ended 2 off pizza and 2 kombucha My friend and I split the ultraviolet and stranger wings and belini and hibiscus kombucha Ultraviolet good amount of pesto it wasnt overpowering I liked the kale and loved the caramelized onions Stranger wings it wasnt that spicy I love cauliflower and it was cooked just enough to make it not super crunchy but not mushy either One piece barley had any toppings I was worried the blue cheese drizzle would be gross but it was fine Kombucha drank them too fast to really get a feel for the flavours but for 2 just go dorn Id go back to try the los tacos and probably the other ones minus the mushroom one
name: Virtuous Pie

author: Clara Y.
description: I was skeptical at first due to the poor reviews but I recently converted to becoming a vegan and I really wanted pizza so I gave it a try I ordered the seafood pizza and the ham and pineaplle pizza but small I made my pizza crust gluten free due to allergies and also ordered a beef donair I liked it Not sure why the reviews were so poor but I had the right amount of toppings cheese and it was delicious The gf crust is very different than most regular pizza stores Their crust is really thin like a tortilla wrap Im not complaining though because if youve ever tried gluten free crust you would know how horrendous it can taste The beef donair was soooo good It had little bits of fake meat lettuce and some vegan mayo or ranch sauce which was quite liquidy it also comes with onions but I dont like onions Their chicken donair comes with tomatos But I was super inflammed after eating half due to it not being gluten free Overall this place is good and I will order from here again
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Angela K.
description: My roommate is vegan so we order from here a lot I normally dont even like vegan pizza cuz the texture seems off and the cheese tastes weird to me However pizza from here is a different story This honestly tastes like normal pizza Its so good Love their Hawaiian the best Even more than pizza though I love their Greek dishes My favourite is the Spanakopita meal Not as good as from a real Greek restaurant but for a vegan dish its pretty awesome
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Sofie P.
description: Some really great options I love that they offer sizes to their orders too so I can try more  I got the Vegan Chicken Donair and Vegan Chicken Caesar Salad The donair was good could have used a bit more flavour but the salad was great I cant wait to try more things on the menu
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Alexa R.
description: I really wish I could eat here being one of the few vegan pizza places in town Unfortunately I have witnessed disturbingly unsanitary kitchen practices and the pizza itself is mediocre The place is clearly severely understaffed I have seen only one person working the entire thing which makes sense why my order has been delivered an hour late before Theres never enough cheese on the pizza and the vegan chicken and ham they use taste disgusting I saw the manager come out of the kitchen wearing gloves he was clearly cooking in ring up the order and handle money and then go back into the kitchen and continue handling food with the same dirty gloves Thats the equivalent of not washing your hands and definitely killed my appetite The whole kitchen looked dingy and unclean and one of the few tables in the restaurant had dirty dishes on them Would not order from here again
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Mari E.
description: As I was alone ordered vegan beef donair and taro bubble tea Vegan beef was quite tasty but they put tons of onions and less tomato  Totally onion breath after eating Maybe I will try regular pizza next time Taro nubble tea was kinda unique Half tea and half slushy And pearl was very very chewy/hard like gummy
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Byron C.
description: 4 Stars There is street parking on Kingsway outside of rush hour and more around the surrounding residential area First impressions its a tiny hole in the wall place They crammed a couple of tables in the small area We are not vegan but wanted to try a healthier pizza option We ordered Combo 6  any large 3 topping pizza large lasagna 2pcs garlic bread tossed salad 29.95 Pizza  super thin crust so its floppy i personally liked the chewy texture of the crust It was really good Lasagna  the vegan meat sauce was different still tasty though Garlic bread  slices were not consistent not overly buttered like a lot of other places Tossed salad  the dressing was really good Service was ok Took the person working the cash register a while to figure out how much change I should get back Overall Experience Service  7/10 Cleanliness  6.5/10 Food  8.6/10 Value  7/10 Parking  7/10
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Stephen S.
description: Just arrived here at 1210 Yelp and the hours on the door clearly state that the business opens at 11:00 every day There is no one here and the doors are locked I made this trip from New Westminster to eat here based on the reviews Save yourself the trouble and dont bother An unreliable business is no business worth supporting Spend your money at any number of other vegan restaurants Thats what I will do
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Karen L.
description: I am not a vegan Actually Im not even close to being a vegan If you talk to any of my friends youll know that I like the concept of being vegan but I could never give up steak or other delicious meaty foods Thus the fact that I find the vegan pizza here delicious should serve as a testament to just how good their food is Their pizza crust is hands down some of the best that Ive ever had and I dont usually consider crust to be the selling point of a pizza for me Furthermore their fake meat toppings are surprisingly tasty as well As for the ambience of the place the service was good but the interior design could use a little work and modernization Whether youre vegan or not I would recommend giving this place a try if youre in the neighbourhood
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Jess S.
description: Thank you for being at the the 2017 Veg Expo I finally had the opportunity to try this pizza and Im so happy I did I ordered a take and bake Vegan Meat Lover Vegan Ham Chicken Capicollo Sausage Bacon Ground Beef gluten free It was 17 for a small add 2 for gluten free crust The crust is super thin and quite strong There is a lot of toppings and it withheld it all Light cheese which is perfect because the main event the meat is so delicious The flavours mimic that is real meat the spices and the texture was such a treat I cannot wait to go back here again
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Kenneth N.
description: I used to think that Rebellious Tomato in DT have the best vegan  daiya cheese VPH has just taken the hammer ever so slightly Lets face it not a place to take a date but does the job Good portions and while price is up there so is the quality Delivery and catering available All cards Parking challenging on Kingsway plenty of side street parking Friendly owner Another bonus workers use plastic gloves
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Annie P.
description: Probably the one thing I miss the most about living in this neighbourhood is having vegan pizza delivered to my doorstep I stumbled on Vegan Pizza House by accident and was hooked immediately and Im not even vegan There is something about their crust their preparation and their attention to detail that is far superior to most pizza joints in the neighbourhood It was the first time I even considered trying a cheeseless pizza and I have to say that with the right ingredients you wont even miss the cheese I liked the cheeseless pizza so much that Ive switched my preference almost completely to cheeseless It just tastes better And youre less sweaty and disgusting afterwards Its a win/win If youre not ready to made the leap to a totally cheeseless pizza they have vegan cheese options daiya which--while not my favourite cheese substitute--is still pretty damn close to the real thing
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Gavin L.
description: Gross honestly I dont like saying this but yeah it was really bad Very obscure sauces Made me feel like somebody was just testing out trying to make pizza for the first time Repulsive flavors honestly and too many types of dishes The kicker was the vegan seafood pizza WHY Also the vibe in the store was obscure and stinky
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Hng T.
description: My friend took me here once and it was amazing The food is so good I am not a vegan but their hawaian pizza had nailed me But my favorite is the donair It looks amazing and it taste so damn good Will try for many time more
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Hannah B.
description: I ordered the meat sauce spaghetti with garlic bread and salad A tasty meal lots of flavour and was a great substantial vegan meal Its fantastic to have a place as a vegan with so many Italian food influenced options Will be ordering from here again
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Kermit K.
description: I have always ordered pizza from here which is quite good but today i tried the souvlaki platter and it was amazing I ordered the beef and it was delish Meat eating bf loved it too So well seasoned and good texture Now i am looking forward to trying the donairs and baked lasagnas
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Mark C.
description: Great people who really care about Vegans choices being true Vegans themselves Pizza is amazing as is the Spaghetti and Lasagne So friendly and Ive not found a true 100% Vegan place in the area anywhere so they are worth coming back from even if Im an hour away
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: April T.
description: Great pizza this is the only place where I like the cheese they put on vegan food great options with takeout/delivery
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Patricia L.
description: My go-to for vegan take out in Vancouver They have a wide range of vegan pizzas which fulfills all my junky pizza cravings I like that they have toppings comparable to the usuals that you would find with non-vegan pizza ie Plain Cheese Meat Lovers Hawaiian Their pizza is greasy goodness The owner is very friendly Ive heard that people have had issues with slow delivery times but I always order for pick up and have never had any problems
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Steven S.
description: Ive become vegan recently so we wandered into this pizza eatery and all was superb Even non-vegans will love these pizzas Super selection of toppings After a day of hiking and skiing these pizza pies hit our yum-yum tummies
name: Vegan Pizza House

author: Kat A.
description: Whenever we are driving through the Kingsway area I always get several pizzas at the Vegan Pizza House So good to have a pizza feast after a hike or a long trip My favourite is the one with eggplants zucchinis smothered in a creamy sauce Ham and pineapple pizza is great too However if you are in downtown then you are now outside the delivery zone Gone are the days of delicious vegan pizza in the West End and downtown
name: Vegan Pizza House
